components.description: A grey heart, frequently used alongside other hearts. Used to represent love, friendship, feelings of warmth, and the color grey.
components.title: Grey Heart

version.description:
Unicode 15.0 is the version of the Unicode Standard released on September 13, 2022. 20 new emoji code points were added in this release, with all 31 new emojis (including sequences) listed under Emoji 15.0.
